channel.title: How can i make an npc stronger?
channel.description: hi i just wanted to know how can i make an npc stronger on a 317 server? using pk planet i know how to edit the hp to make it higher go to npc.cfg and all that, but how do i make it hit more? like instead of max being 40 make it like 60?

item.title: How can i make an npc stronger?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

I think the code is like this:

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { // jad
	hitDiff = misc.random(99);

Read full topic

item.title: How can i make an npc stronger?
item.dc:creator: @raulhenriq raulhenriq
item.description:
@raulhenriq wrote:

go to you npchandler.java and then search for the npc id. There will probaly be a code like this in there:

					} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 913 && plr.ProtMage == false) {
                                           npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 811; // mage attack
                                           plr.specGFX(76);

hitDiff = 3 + misc.random(15);

the last line means that it will hit 3 and a random hit up to 15…
So thats what u have to change to make the npc hit higher
if u cant find that thats because it isnt there yet, so you will have to add it… just copy some existing one… gl with that

Read full topic
